Interface SceneModelParams

SceneModel creation parameters for Scene.createModel.

Hierarchy

  • SceneModelParams

Index

Properties

  • id
  • matrix
  • origin
  • position
  • qualityRender
  • quaternion
  • rotation
  • scale
  • viewLayerId

Properties

Optional id

id: string
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:13

Unique ID for the SceneModel.

The SceneModel is stored with this ID in {@link Scene.sceneModels}

Optional matrix

matrix: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:25

4x4 transform matrix.

Optional origin

origin: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:54

RTC coordinate origin for the SceneModel.

Default is [0, 0, 0].

Optional position

position: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:47

World-space position of the SceneModel.

qualityRender

qualityRender: boolean
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:20

Whether quality rendering is enabled for the SceneModel.

Default is true.

Optional quaternion

quaternion: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:37

Quaternion defining the orientation of the SceneModel.

Optional rotation

rotation: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:42

Orientation of the SceneModel, given as Euler angles in degrees for X, Y and Z axis.

Optional scale

scale: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:32

Scale of the SceneModel.

Default is [1,1,1].

Optional viewLayerId

viewLayerId: string
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneModelParams.ts:64

Causes each View to put ViewObjects for the new SceneModel into a ViewLayer with this ID.

Each View will create the ViewLayer first, if required.

Overridden by SceneObjectParams.viewLayerId.
